title: Enhancing Medical Practice Competencies: Virtual Simulation Training for Strengthening Radiologic Technology Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental radiation physics and safety management knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can implement radiographic positioning with over 80% accuracy in a virtual simulation environment.
Learners can explain three or more strategies to minimize radiation exposure risks in scenarios reflecting real clinical situations.
Learners achieve a minimum score of 75/100 on post-simulation evaluations to confirm practical applicability.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
